title: Patchwork City
outcome: The city is fragmented as neighborhoods experience wild swings in BCI privileges, isolating communities and driving residents to desperate actions. Uneven service access and arbitrary restrictions fuel unrest, distrust, and opportunistic power grabs by Council factions.

events.description: Residents in some districts find their BCI scores suddenly increased, granting them rapid service, job access, and bonuses; blocks away, similar residents experience total service denial and travel barriers.
Dozens of families attempt to relocate to high-score zones, only to be intercepted by automated drones rerouting or blocking their movement based on shifting BCI data.
Directorate officials push for heightened containment in unstable districts, deploying patrols and threatening score penalties for unrest, amplifying local tensions.
A public demonstration against scoring injustices in a pilot zone is met with swift BCI downgrades and subsequent blackout of transit and digital access, isolating the area.
Harmonist Council members float an amnesty proposal, but disagreements stall any unified response, leaving the city increasingly divided and volatile.
